text: The 1940 Rhode Island gubernatorial election was held on November 5, 1940. Democratic nominee J. Howard McGrath defeated incumbent Republican William Henry Vanderbilt III with 55.84% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== Major party candidates *J. Howard McGrath, Democratic *William Henry Vanderbilt III, Republican Other candidates *Wilfred J. Boissy, Communist ===Results=== ==References== 1940 Rhode Island Gubernatorial
title: 1940 Rhode Island gubernatorial election
